ERRORS.NUMBER: Field should have at least one digit
ERRORS.UPPER_CASE: Field should have at least one uppercase letter
ERRORS.LOWER_CASE: Field should have at least one lowercase letter
ERRORS.LENGTH_BIGGER_THEN: Field length should be more than {{length}} character(s)
ERRORS.SAME_FIELDS: Fields {{label}} and {{labelConfirm}} are not the same
